original_title: It Stays With You: Use Of Force By UN Peacekeepers In Haiti
overview: In the mid 2000s, The UN Peacekeeping Troops raided the neighbourhood of Cité Soleil in Haiti several times, targetting gang leaders and killing many innocents in the proces. Cahal McLaughlin and Siobhán Wills visit the area ten years after to explore the aftermath.
title: It Stays With You: Use Of Force By UN Peacekeepers In Haiti
